Sentencas: We propose an enhanced integrated hydrogen production system that includes biological processes.
Titulo: Enhanced hydrogen production from indirectly heated, gasified biomass, and removal of carbon gas emissions using a novel biological gas reformer

Sentencas: Biomass gasification, achieved through the periodic combustion and pyrolysis of solid organic waste (under anaerobic conditions), results in a producer-gas stream consisting predominantly of carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide and hydrogen.
Titulo: Enhanced hydrogen production from indirectly heated, gasified biomass, and removal of carbon gas emissions using a novel biological gas reformer

Sentencas: This producer gas is typically used as a fuel in high temperature combustion.
Titulo: Enhanced hydrogen production from indirectly heated, gasified biomass, and removal of carbon gas emissions using a novel biological gas reformer

Sentencas: In the modified process, the producer gas is used to generate electricity using a combination of high-temperature (Solid oxide) and low-temperature (Proton exchange membrane) fuel cells.
Titulo: Enhanced hydrogen production from indirectly heated, gasified biomass, and removal of carbon gas emissions using a novel biological gas reformer

Sentencas: Carbon monoxide is reformed to additional H-2 using a biological system; an anaerobic bacterium, Rubrivivax gelatinosus CBS that can enzymatically convert CO and H2O into CO2 and H-2.
Titulo: Enhanced hydrogen production from indirectly heated, gasified biomass, and removal of carbon gas emissions using a novel biological gas reformer

Sentencas: R. gelatinosus CBS can also sequester CO2 as biomass.
Titulo: Enhanced hydrogen production from indirectly heated, gasified biomass, and removal of carbon gas emissions using a novel biological gas reformer

Sentencas: While the heating value does not vary significantly between the two streams, we propose that a larger hydrogen fraction can increase the value of this fuel, especially in the context of fuel cell applications.
Titulo: Enhanced hydrogen production from indirectly heated, gasified biomass, and removal of carbon gas emissions using a novel biological gas reformer

Sentencas: (C) 2003 Published by Elsevier Ltd on behalf of the International Association for Hydrogen Energy.
Titulo: Enhanced hydrogen production from indirectly heated, gasified biomass, and removal of carbon gas emissions using a novel biological gas reformer
